description.short: Beaver Hours is an application for organizing office hours
description.full: Beaver Hours is an application that allows students and teachers collaborate better. Using Beaver Hours teachers can organize their office hours more efficiently and make sure their students get the help they need.

commands.title: start office hour
commands.description: Start a new office hour queue

commands.title: end office hour
commands.description: End the active office hour queue

commands.title: join office hours
commands.description: Jump in queue to get help from the instructor. Optionally, you can add your question to the end of the command.

commands.title: private join office hours
commands.description: Jump in queue to get help from the instructor but have your question hidden.

commands.title: get queue position
commands.description: Find out where you are in line

commands.title: my office hours
commands.description: Get a list of your office hours

commands.title: view queue [queueId]
commands.description: Show the list of students in the office hour queue with the given ID, or the current office hour if no ID is provided.
